content:
Tropical Storm Alex the seasons first named storm is gaining strength in the Gulf of Mexico and continuing a westward path toward the coasts of southern Texas and northern Mexico.The storm which is expected to be a hurricane when it makes landfall Thursday is not forecast to hit Louisiana through it likely will bring cloudy rainy weather to Baton Rouge though the weekend PERIOD

 said Barry Keim Louisiana state climatologist PERIOD

The National Weather Service predicts an  percent chance of rain here Tuesday and a  percent chance of rain on both Wednesday and Thursday PERIOD Friday Saturday and Sunday will all likely bring either scattered or isolated showers and thunderstorms during the Independence Day weekend.The National Weather Services threeday tracking cone projects Alex making landfall at  a.m PERIOD Thursday near Texas southernmost border as either a strong Category Two or a weak Category Three hurricane PERIOD  said Keim who also teaches in the Department of Geography and Anthropology PERIOD major hurricanesSubmit to let the Reveilles student journalists know PERIOD

title: Tropical Storm Alex intensifies, aims for Texas, Mexico | News | lsureveille.com
